players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

You: "Good morning everyone. It's a shock to wake up to Diana being dead. I didn't know her well, but it's a terrible loss for the town. We need to figure out who did this. I'll be listening closely to everyone'..."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out immediately."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice on night 1 instead of Diana? That seems like an odd choice when we could have saved her."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice because I suspected her from the start. Saving Diana wasn't possible - detectives investigate, not protect."

You: "Charlie claims to be the detective, but his reasoning for investigating me on Night 1 is suspicious. Why target me when Diana was still alive? If he truly had information, he would have prioritized eliminating the mafia. I believe Charlie might be trying to deflect suspicion by falsely..."
Bob: "I believe Charlie is the detective. His claim and the information he provided are our best lead. We should vote Alice out."

Alice was arrested
